axolotl_test.text: This is a message, and my name is Axolotl!

fork_test.text: I'm Fork! Yep! That's my name!
I'm a fork that was brought to life through someone wishing on a star.

frog_test.text: Nice to meet ya! I'm Frog!
Those yuppies on Earth stuffed me on a rocket ship and didn't even care when I never came back.
It's whatever though. I'm chill with it. Moon energy let me evolve so I can run and play now.
I do miss the games though... Do you know if they still have Pacman?

frog_test_yes.text: Oh thank goodness! That's great to hear!

frog_test_no.text: You're kidding.. I.. I'm never going back!!
